pregnancy_stage_tips.awareness: You're in the awareness phase—focus on optimizing health before conception.
pregnancy_stage_tips.trying: You're trying to conceive—consider prenatal vitamins and regular health screenings.
pregnancy_stage_tips.pregnant: You're currently pregnant—attend regular prenatal visits and follow medical advice.

diabetes.awareness: Manage blood sugar levels before conception to reduce pregnancy complications.
diabetes.trying: Monitor glucose levels and adopt a balanced diet to support fertility.
diabetes.pregnant: Gestational diabetes may affect your baby's growth—follow medical advice closely.

asthma.awareness: Manage asthma symptoms to avoid complications during pregnancy.
asthma.trying: Keep asthma well-controlled to ensure better respiratory health for pregnancy.
asthma.pregnant: Uncontrolled asthma may affect fetal oxygen—consult your doctor for a safe treatment plan.

smoking.pregnant: Smoking during pregnancy increases the risk of premature birth and low birth weight. Seek support to quit immediately.
smoking.default: Consider quitting smoking to reduce health risks and improve pregnancy outcomes.

high.pregnant: High pollution exposure during pregnancy may affect fetal development. Minimize exposure where possible.
high.default: Reduce exposure to polluted areas when possible for better long-term health.

medium.default: Be mindful of pollution exposure and consider using air purifiers.

frequent.pregnant: Avoid alcohol entirely during pregnancy to prevent fetal alcohol syndrome.
frequent.default: Limit alcohol intake to lower health risks and improve fertility outcomes.

occasional.default: Moderate alcohol consumption is better for overall health and future pregnancy.

exercise.none: Incorporate regular physical activity into your routine for better health.
exercise.low: Increase exercise frequency to improve overall and reproductive health.
